description: 3-5 bullets with the core findings/recommendations and business impact
Why is this topic important now? What are the high-level goals (compliance, risk mitigation, performance, etc.)?
Top 3-5 business risks; Strategic opportunities, ideally quantified
Overview of current environment/architecture/process; Key challenges and pain points, using data where available
High-level description of the proposed solution; Business and technical rationale; Key benefits/features
Brief summary of other options considered; Pros/cons table; Rationale for chosen solution
Major phases, timeline, and milestones; Dependencies, required resources
Cost, savings, payback period, TCO, ROI; Use table/chart/graphic if possible
How the solution addresses risk, security, and compliance; Outstanding issues and mitigations
Specific success metrics (RTO, RPO, uptime %, compliance pass rate, etc.)
Clear, actionable next steps; Decision or endorsement required
Detailed technical diagrams, architectures, or data; Only include if requested or supporting content provided
